alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 2:51AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL ISLE OF WIGHT... SOUTHEASTERN YORK AND SOUTHEASTERN JAMES CITY COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS THROUGH 315 AM EST... At 251 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Fort Eustis to near Smithfield to near Zuni. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Newport News, Hampton, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Grove, Fort Eustis, Lee Hall, Denbigh, Beaconsdale, and Busch Gardens around 255 AM EST. Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Gloucester Point, Seaford, Northampton, and Tabb around 300 AM EST. Langley AFB around 305 AM EST. Hampton University around 310 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Fox Hill, Carrollton, Lackey, Phoebus, Langley View, Longview, Benns Church, Oriana, Hilton Village, and Raleigh Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; York
